phrases: We are here to save Kagome
who was abducted by the Panther-Demon Tribe!
Then come to our castle to get her.
Hurry up and move outta the way, or you will get it!
Go through us if you can.
I thought you would be weaker than before.
After all, who was it that cut it off?
The party will start very soon.
but he is the one firing them.
What about the one who is down?
I do not think he fainted... more like he is asleep.
My name means to perceive right.
As long as I know which is which...
We will continue this at the castle.
Damn her and her stupid tricks!
The time is upon us, Master!
The moon is almost directly overhead.
Soon, the dogs we despise so much will be slaughtered
and the Panther-Demon Tribe will rule victorious over this land.
Soon, our master will be resurrected.
Give me blood... flesh... and a soul!
As if you can break the supreme master's barrier!
You can stay there and watch the sacrificial lambs being devoured.
They are feeding us to him!
I searched for you, my lord!
When did he learn to use Tetsusaiga like that?
No need to worry anymore, Kagome.
He took on the Supreme Master!
The Sacred Jewel shards are in his throat.
You guys, do not let the prisoners escape!
Are not we important sacrificial lambs?
You are not supposed to kill us, right?
Please wait just a bit longer.
with the head of our despised enemy's son!
I do not care who he is...
But you cannot use human blood and flesh to resurrect him!
Well, you are going to be the first!
And you will become fodder for Tetsusaiga!
You are the one, Lord Sesshomaru!
There is nothing like victory in war!
Tenseiga is a sword of healing.
I cannot kill my enemies with it.
The other sword that Father left... Tetsusaiga.
I cannot wield that sword Tetsusaiga.
Pinned down like this, you cannot use that sword, can you?
Do not get in my way!
Why cannot they join forces at a time like this?!
I do not need any help.
If they are in disarray, we must stay united.
We will combine all our powers at once.
We shall offer you their lives in but a moment!
He... he devoured his own kin to revive himself!
The two sons of the Great Dog-Demon.
You will now feel my wrath!
You are still mumbling in your sleep!
You got the strength to fight my old man.
Do not compare him to Ryukotsusei whom you defeated!
He has the power of the Sacred Jewel shards now!
You can become a part of me, too.
You want me to draw you?
Father, why did you leave me the Tensaiga?
The rest is up to you and Tetsusaiga.
I thought the master had killed us.
It is because of Lord Sesshomaru's power!
And Lord Sesshomaru used the Tenseiga to restore them.
No, we will return to the west.
There is no reason to seek revenge anymore.
Well, when you feel like talking to him.
The cat-demons will not be back.
Thanks to you, we can live here in peace now.
I was not able to help Lord Sesshomaru again!
no wonder the mortals are scared.
What a burden to be lumped in with them!
You expect those mortals to thank you?
By the way, we still have a score to settle.
With faithful Jaken at your heels...
Sango has a proposal from a lord?
She has me at her side, yet Sango is so flirtatious!
He is handsome, upright, and really loves you.
It is not our place to express our opinions.
Will not you make up your mind?!
Well, I will decide for you then!
Next on Inuyasha: Only You, Sango
